ygData.subject: RE: Bard Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: We never take the group into the Keep, we always stay at the front on the wall side of the moat. Our best puller then works his way into the place pulling 2 to
ygData.messageBody:
We never take the group into the Keep, we always stay at the front on the
wall side of the moat. Our best puller then works his way into the place
pulling 2 to 3 frogs at a time till we clear the place. Then we pull the
Priest for the Leggings, or the Crusader. This is an amazing place for XP
though. I made 7 bubbles there and went from 36 to 38 one Saturday.

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 11:07 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Weapons


From: jhenders@...

On Wed, Aug 18/99, "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...> wrote:
> From: "Chris Kuenster (Entex)" <v-ntxck@...>
>
> Oh man he is a badass, hits for dbl 120's and is really fast. We fought
him
> twice along with 2 or 3 Zols. All he dropped those times was the Tunic.
> Thanks for the info we were going to ignore him from now on because the
> Mithril tunic just wasnt that good.

Yup, and he can lay hands on himself a couple of times in the fight to
boot. Our then L35 group died quite nastily in the bottom of that tower
a few times to him. The falchion is another one of those real rare drops
Verant loves so much. :(
